mapper.update:
update user_seller
seller_name = #{sellerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seller_picture = #{sellerPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notice = #{notice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seller_type = #{sellerType,jdbcType=CHAR},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIME},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIME},
business_sign = #{businessSign,jdbcType=CHAR},
money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update user_seller set seller_name = #{sellerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seller_picture = #{sellerPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notice = #{notice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seller_type = #{sellerType,jdbcType=CHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIME}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIME}, business_sign = #{businessSign,jdbcType=CHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into user_seller (id, seller_name, phone,parent_id) values (#{0}, #{1}, #{2} ,#{3} )
mapper.select: select seller_type,category_name from user_seller join category on user_seller.seller_type=(category.id+"") where (((#{0}-lon)*100)*((#{0}-lon)*100)+((#{1}-lat)*100)*((#{1}-lat)*100)) < 1 group by seller_type

select
from user_seller where (((#{lon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}-lon)*100)*((#{lon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}-lon)*100)+((#{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}-lat)*100)*((#{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}-lat)*100)) < 1 and seller_type = #{sellerType,jdbcType=CHAR} order by (((#{lon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}-lon)*100)*((#{lon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}-lon)*100)+((#{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}-lat)*100)*((#{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}-lat)*100))
